ARABIC: قَالَ نَعَمْ وَإِنَّكُمْ إِذًا لَّمِنَ ٱلْمُقَرَّبِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'Yes, and in that case you will be among those brought near.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Yes," he replied. "You 'will be among the honoured."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He said: "Yes, you will then become those near-stationed to me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He replied, "You will then be my closest associates".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “Yes, and you will then become close to me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "Yes, and you shall then verily be of those brought near (to myself)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: Yes, and surely you will then be of those who are made near.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'Yes indeed; and you shall then be among the near-stationed.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: Aye, and ye will then surely be of those brought near (to me).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He replied, "Certainly, in that case you will join my inner circle."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: yea; and ye shall verily then be of those brought nigh.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘Of course; and you will be among members of my inner circle.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said: "Yea, (and more),- for ye shall in that case be (raised to posts) nearest (to my person)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He said: "Yes, and you shall then verily be of those brought near (to myself)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Yes, indeed' he answered, 'and you shall become among those who are near stationed'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “Yes, and you will be among those favored.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He said, "Yes, and indeed, you will then be of those near [to me]."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:42] He said, ‘Yes [of course]! And you shall then be among those closest [to me]’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Pharaoh said: (Aye) you will have that, (and ye will then surely be of those brought near) in terms of status, position and attending my assembly.
